Posts.Content: Jun 21, 2012 02:28PM angellunch wrote: Hi Roberta, I know exactly how you feel.  I was diagnosed with cancer in Feb 2012.  I couldn't get over it for the longest time. I had to make a decision between a lumpectomy+radiation(6.5 wks)+tamoxifen(5 yrs) or a unilateral mx.  I just sat on the decision making until my dr had to force me to make a decision sometime in March 2012.  I sat up all day and night researching and after 1 week, made a decision to have an mx done.  It was the toughest decision I had ever made. We are here for you.
Posts.Title: choosing how much you want to know about your condition ro-berta msphil
